name: Lebanese Kabab Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Lebanese Kabab Recipe: Beef mince Â½ kg Lamb fat (optional) 1 cup Parsley 1 bunch Minced onion 1 large Cumin seeds 1 tbsp Garlic 1 tbsp Salt 1 tsp White pepper 1 tsp Oregano 1 tsp Cinnamon powder 1 tsp Bread crumbs 2 cups Oil 6 tbsp
instructions: In a bowl add all the ingredients except oil and mix well. Then grind and make long kabab. Now heat oil in a pan and fry kabab on high heat for 2 to 3 minutes. Then lower the heat and cook for further 8 to 10 minutes. Serve.
